messages.title: Re-elect Vernon on 8 June
messages.content: This Thursday 8 June you have a choice between Vernon, your local champion, or a Tory outsider.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Vernon to stand up for Gedling's people or Tory who will simply hold up her hand when told to.

issues.brexitEurope: On BREXIT, do you want Vernon to stand up for Gedling's people or a Tory who will simply hold up her hand when told to?

community.content: Vernon lives in Nottinghamshire with his family and went to school there.

images.caption: Labour – Don't give the Tories a blank cheque

leaflet.additionalNotes:
5 THINGS TO REMEMBER ABOUT VOTING
1. You don’t need your polling card to vote
2. Polling stations are open 7am to 10pm
3. If you applied for a postal vote but haven’t sent it back yet, you can still deliver it by hand to any polling station.
4. If you don’t know where your polling station is, or you need a lift to vote, call our hotline on 07572 355781.
5. Place a X next to Vernon’s name!

examples: History shows no other candidate can win so vote for anyone but Vernon is to let the Tories in.
On BREXIT, do you want Vernon to stand up for Gedling's people or a Tory who will simply hold up her hand when told to?
Vernon lives in Nottinghamshire with his family and went to school there.
Don’t give the Tories a blank cheque
